hi! this deck is about

wags.fm

so that's wags.fm!

we're building an open-source, code-based musical creation environment where up to 100 people can edit and remix the music in real time.

wags is all about collaboration

the editor below can host up to 100 musicians collaborating on the same work. open the link https://yap.wags.fm/p/deck from your phone and see for yourself!

all-in on the creator economy

wags.fm will power hxaro, a web3-powered platform where musicians and coders pair up to create interactive musical experiences in the browser. agents across the musical supply chain get paid fairly and immediately.

we're building a team

join us as we get it into the hands of millions of creators and billions of listeners.
